scripts.build: npx tsc src/index.ts --outdir dist/ && copyfiles -u 1 --all "src/static/**/*" dist
scripts.serve: npx pm2 start index.js --name coewatt -i 3 && npx pm2 start static/tester.js --name tester -i 3
scripts.buildwatt: npx prisma migrate dev --create-only --name watt && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma db seed && npm run build
scripts.package: copyfiles -u 1 --all "dist/**/*" ../coewatt && copyfiles -u 1 --all "data/**/*" ../coewatt/data && copyfiles -u 1 --all "prisma/**/*" ../coewatt/prisma && copyfiles -u 1 --all "node_modules/**/*" ../coewatt/node_modules && copy /y ".env" ..\coewatt && copy /y "package*.*" ..\coewatt  && copyfiles -u 1 --all "src/static/**/*" ../coewatt/src/static && copyfiles -u 1 --all "src/static/css/**/*" ../coewatt/src/static/css && copy /y "src\static\*.pug" ..\coewatt\src\static\
